review: Awesome product.  Displaced an Xbox that we only used for non gaming functions.  Very simple to install and use, and LOVE the compact design.  Also love that it can connect to a high speed wired connection that we have near our TV.  This product is a winner!
author: Jason M.

review: I got this for my mom and her husband for Christmas. They are not tech savvy at all, so I was kind of scared that even though this seemed really simple to use they would still have issues. They have done fantastic!! My mom even hooked this up herself with a little coaching over the phone. They got a Netflix account, and I had made her a list of "mom friendly" movies and shows on Netflix. They are very happy with Fire TV and haven't had any problems or complaints. I want one now for me!!
author: Carrie Barker
